title: K-12 Real-Life Context-Based Mathematics Problem-Solving Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental arithmetic operations and everyday problem-solving experience
context.additional_context: Conducted in a VR simulation environment via smartphones, applying mathematical concepts while virtually experiencing problem situations in daily life.

learning_goals: Learners can explain mathematical modeling processes by analyzing given real-life scenarios
Learners can independently perform fraction/ratio problem-solving in virtual simulation environments with over 80% accuracy
Learners can present three or more practical applications of mathematical concepts using contextual clues during problem-solving

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
